channel.title: Stackstorm REST Api reference
channel.description: Have a couple of quick questions:. --Is there any good documentation or samples for the API usage. i.e Looking at https://api.stackstorm.com/api/v1/rules/#/rule_controller.post, cannot really make out what the endpoint is expecting. --Don't see endpoints to play around with workflows. --Is there a swagger endpoint?

item.title: Stackstorm REST Api reference
item.dc:creator: lhill
item.description:
Try using the st2 --debug CLI option to see the equivalent curl calls.

Read full topic

item.title: Stackstorm REST Api reference
item.dc:creator: hnanchahal
item.description:
Have a couple of quick questions:.
–Is there any good documentation or samples for the API usage. i.e Looking at https://api.stackstorm.com/api/v1/rules/#/rule_controller.post, cannot really make out what the endpoint is expecting.
–Don’t see endpoints to play around with workflows.
–Is there a swagger endpoint?

Read full topic
